text: James Henry Caldwell was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper in the Scottish League for East Stirlingshire and Alloa Athletic. He also played Football League for Everton and Woolwich Arsenal. == Personal life == Caldwell served as a private in the Black Watch during the First World War. == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |+Appearances and goals by club, season and competition ! rowspan="2" |Club ! rowspan="2" |Season ! colspan="3" |League ! colspan="2" |National Cup ! colspan="2" |Other ! colspan="2" |Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- | rowspan="3" |East Stirlingshire |1906–07 | rowspan="2" |Scottish Second Division |16 |0 |1 |0 | colspan="2" |― |17 |0 |- |1907–08 |22 |0 |0 |0 |9Appearances in Scottish Qualifying Cup |0 |31 |0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !38 !0 !1 !0 !9 !0 !48 !0 |- |Everton |1912–13 |First Division |31 |0 |5 |0 | colspan="2" |― |36 |0 |- |Woolwich Arsenal |1913–14 |Second Division |3 |0 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |― |3 |0 |- |Alloa Athletic |1921–22 |Scottish Second Division |36 |0 |3 |0 | colspan="2" |― |39 |0 |- | rowspan="2" |East Stirlingshire |1922–23 |Scottish Second Division |18 |0 |0 |0 | colspan="2" |― |18 |0 |- ! colspan="2" |East Stirlingshire total !56 !0 !1 !0 !9 !0 !66 !0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !126 !0 !9 !0 !9 !0 !144 !0 |} == Honours == Dunipace * Scottish Junior Cup: 1905–06 Alloa Athletic * Scottish Second Division: 1921–22 == References == Category:Scottish footballers Category:Reading F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing Category:1884 births Category:People from Falkirk (council area) Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Southern Football League players Category:Dunipace F.C. players Category:East Stirlingshire F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Tottenham Hotspur F.C. players Category:Arsenal F.C. players Category:Alloa Athletic F.C. players Category:British Army personnel of World War I Category:Black Watch soldiers
